services.title: Additional Services
services.description: One-time services to get you started even faster
services.onboarding_description: Migration from your current system, data import, team training and setup assistance. Price depends on complexity.

services.website_includes: Includes: Custom design, development, CRM integration, SEO optimization, hosting setup
services.training_description: Additional training sessions, workshops for your team, or in-depth feature training.
services.training_includes: Includes: Customized training, live sessions or recordings, training materials
services.support_description: Priority support via phone, email and chat. Dedicated account manager and SLA guarantees.
services.support_includes: Includes: <1 hour response time, dedicated account manager, monthly review calls, priority feature requests

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about pricing
faq.answer_1: Everything! Complete CRM with Seller & Buyer Deal Pipelines, Client Portal, AI-powered Smart Matching, Email integration, Property Management, Website hosting, Reports, WhatsApp integration, Document storage and basic support. Up to 10 users included.
faq.question_2: What happens if I need more than 10 users?
faq.answer_2: For offices with more than 10 users we offer custom pricing. Contact us and we'll create a suitable quote based on your specific needs.
faq.question_3: What is the Fair Use Policy?
faq.answer_3: All features have reasonable usage limits to prevent abuse (e.g. AI matching requests, storage, email sending). With normal usage you won't encounter these limits. View the full Fair Use Policy for details.
faq.question_4: Can I add or remove users?
faq.answer_4: Yes, you can add or remove users at any time up to a maximum of 10 users. Above 10 users we need custom pricing.
faq.answer_5: After 14 days you'll automatically be switched to the ‚Ç¨99/month subscription. You'll receive a reminder beforehand. No credit card needed during the trial.
faq.answer_6: No, there are no setup fees. You only pay the monthly subscription of ‚Ç¨99. Onboarding and migration are optional services (from ‚Ç¨495).
faq.question_7: Which payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer_7: We accept all major credit cards, iDEAL, and SEPA direct debit for annual payments.
faq.question_8: Is there a discount for annual payment?
faq.answer_8: Yes, with annual payment you get 2 months free (16% discount). That's ‚Ç¨1,188 instead of ‚Ç¨1,188. Save ‚Ç¨198 per year!
faq.question_9: Can I cancel at any time?
faq.answer_9: Yes, no lock-in contracts. You can cancel monthly and export your data whenever you want.
faq.answer_10: Yes, you can export all your data at any time in CSV or JSON format. You maintain full control over your data.

benefits.title: Why Smart Matching Works

workflow.step_4_description: You and the customer immediately receive notifications of new matches

cta.title: Ready to work smarter?

deal_pipeline.meta_title: Real Estate Deal Pipeline - Seller & Buyer Deals | Tesoro CRM
deal_pipeline.meta_description: Two distinct pipelines: Seller Deals (sale) and Buyer Deals (purchase) with complete context. Matching happens IN the buyer deal. Momentum-driven philosophy.

hero.title: Real Estate Deal Pipeline - Where Money Is Made
hero.description: Two distinct deal types for real estate: Seller Deals (owner wants to sell) and Buyer Deals (searching houses for buyer). Each deal has complete context with all communication, stakeholders and documents in one card.

intro.title: Deals - The Core of Real Estate CRM
intro.description: In real estate everything revolves around two things: Finding leads and closing deals. A Deal is where you make money. Tesoro has two main types:
intro.seller_description: Owner wants to sell their house. Agent appraises, lists the property, puts it online and on portals, runs social media campaign. Generates leads who are interested.
intro.buyer_description: Buyer is looking for a house. This is where matching happens! Agent doesn't search for buyers but for houses for the buyer. Complete workflow from knowing property to signing deed.

seller_deal.title: Seller Deal Pipeline
seller_deal.description: From mandate to won/lost - complete workflow for sale deals with all stakeholders and communication in one overview.
seller_deal.stage_1_description: Owner gives assignment to sell house. Agent appraises and makes agreements.
seller_deal.stage_2_description: Property is online on portals (Funda, Idealista, etc.). Photos, description, floor plans. Marketing campaign starts.
seller_deal.stage_3_description: Interested buyers schedule viewings. Agent shows the house and collects feedback.
seller_deal.stage_4_description: Buyer makes an offer. Negotiations begin. Back and forth until agreement or buyer walks away.
seller_deal.stage_5_description: Agreement reached! Property reserved for buyer. Off the market. Buyer arranges financing.
seller_deal.stage_6_description: Buyer pays 10% deposit. Contracts signed. Commitment from both sides.
seller_deal.stage_7_description: Notary appointment. Deed signed. Money transferred. Deal successfully closed!
seller_deal.stage_8_description: Deal fell through. Financing not approved, or buyer or seller pulled out. Learn from it for next time.

buyer_deal.title: Buyer Deal Pipeline - The Most Important One
buyer_deal.description: This is where matching happens! From knowing property to signing deed. Momentum is crucial - stagnation means problem in the relationship.
buyer_deal.stage_1_description: You know exactly what client is looking for. Budget, location, property type, wishes. Matching system gets activated.
buyer_deal.stage_1_philosophy: This must QUICKLY move to First Visit. If this gets stuck, something is wrong with the relationship building!
buyer_deal.stage_2_description: Client has viewed the property once. First impression. Notes during viewing. 5-star rating in portal.
buyer_deal.stage_2_philosophy: If First Visit gets stuck and doesn't move to Multiple Visits, something is also going on. More contact = stronger bond!
buyer_deal.stage_3_description: Client has been back 2-3 times. Seriously interested. Brings partner, parents or advisor along.
buyer_deal.stage_4_description: Client makes an offer on the property. Negotiations with seller. Often back and forth.
buyer_deal.stage_5_description: Offer accepted! Property reserved. Now financing must be arranged.
buyer_deal.stage_6_description: Financing approved. 10% deposit paid. Contracts signed. This is commitment!
buyer_deal.stage_7_description: Notary appointment scheduled. Final inspection done. Deed signing approaches.
buyer_deal.stage_8_description: Keys handed over! Client is now owner. Deal successfully closed. Commission earned!
buyer_deal.stage_9_description: Deal fell through. Financing not approved, structural issues found, or client pulled out. Learn from it.

complete_context.title: Everything in One Deal Card
complete_context.description: When you open a deal card, you see everything related to that deal. Complete context without having to search.
complete_context.feature_1_description: All activities: emails, calls, WhatsApp, meetings. Complete timeline of what happened.
complete_context.feature_2_description: All deal details: price, conditions, deadlines, financing status. Everything in one place.
complete_context.feature_3_description: Not just the seller/buyer, but also architect, energy label specialist, lawyer, notary, other agents - everyone involved with this deal.
complete_context.feature_4_description: All tasks related to this deal. Schedule viewing, call financing, send documents.
complete_context.feature_5_description: All notes about this deal. What was discussed? What needs to happen? Everything saved.
complete_context.feature_6_description: All emails related to this deal. Automatic sync with Gmail/Outlook. Complete history.
complete_context.feature_7_description: All phone calls. Who called whom? When? What was discussed? Notes per call.
complete_context.feature_8_description: WhatsApp integration. All messages about this deal. Complete communication history.
complete_context.feature_9_description: All viewings and meetings. When? Where? Who was there? What was discussed?
complete_context.feature_10_description: All documents: contracts, IDs, appraisal reports, financing documents. Everything in one place.

buyer_deal_special.title: Buyer Deal - Properties Tab
buyer_deal_special.description: In a Buyer Deal there's an extra tab that doesn't exist in Seller Deals: the Properties tab. This is where magic happens.
buyer_deal_special.matching_description: In the Properties tab of a Buyer Deal you see the matching system. All matched properties appear there. Preselect lane, Propose lane - everything happens within the deal context.
buyer_deal_special.integration_description: Matching is not a separate feature but integrated IN the buyer deal. You see immediately which properties fit this client. All within the same deal card.
buyer_deal_special.philosophy_description: Knowing Property ‚Üí First Visit must happen QUICKLY. First Visit ‚Üí Multiple Visits = more contact = stronger bond. Stagnation = problem.

stakeholders.title: Stakeholder Management
stakeholders.description: A real estate deal involves many parties. Not just buyer and seller, but also:
stakeholders.seller_deal_stakeholders: Selling party, architect, energy label specialist, lawyer, notary, other agents with clients
stakeholders.buyer_deal_stakeholders: Buying party, mortgage advisor, building inspector, notary, lawyer

philosophy.title: The Momentum Philosophy
philosophy.description: In real estate CRM, momentum is everything. A deal that gets stuck is a deal at risk.
philosophy.principle_1_description: As soon as you know what client wants, the first visit must happen quickly. If this gets stuck, something is wrong with the relationship.
philosophy.principle_2_description: If client was there once but doesn't come back, there's also something going on. More contact = stronger bond!
philosophy.principle_3_description: If a deal doesn't move, red flags go up. Call the client. What's going on? Are there doubts? Act proactively.
philosophy.quote: More contact = stronger bond. Momentum is key in real estate.

kanban_view.title: Visual Kanban View
kanban_view.description: All your deals in a clear kanban board. Drag & drop between stages.
kanban_view.filter_description: Filter on agent, property type, price range, status. See through the forest. Find exactly the deal you're looking for.

vs_competition.title: Why Tesoro Deals Are Different
vs_competition.description: Most CRMs have one generic pipeline. Tesoro has two distinct types for real estate:
vs_competition.difference_1_description: Seller Deal and Buyer Deal each have their own workflow and stages. Not generic but real estate-specific.
vs_competition.difference_2_description: Everything in one deal card: 10 tabs with all communication, stakeholders, documents. Nothing gets lost.
vs_competition.difference_3_description: Matching is not separate but integrated IN the buyer deal. Properties tab shows all matches.
vs_competition.difference_4_description: Philosophy built in: Knowing ‚Üí First Visit = fast. Stagnation = problem. The system warns you.

cta.title: Ready to Close More Deals?
cta.description: Discover how Tesoro's real estate-specific deal pipeline increases your success rate.

client_portal.meta_title: Client Portal - The Must-Have Tool for House Hunting | Tesoro CRM
client_portal.meta_description: Portal for ALL visited properties with photo uploads, private notes and 5-star ratings. Clients never lose overview with 20+ viewings per week. Creates loyalty.

hero.title: The Must-Have Tool for Complete House Hunting
hero.description: A portal for ALL properties your client visits - not just Tesoro proposals. With photo uploads, private notes and 5-star ratings. So your client maintains overview with 20+ viewings per week. And stays loyal to you.

benefits.loyalty_desc: clients stay with the same agent

problem.title: The Problem with Other CRMs
problem.description: We did research with 100+ agents. What did we find? Other CRMs automatically send emails to clients as soon as there's a match - without consulting the agent.
problem.pain_1_description: Clients see properties that don't fit in terms of architecture or location. Match on budget and rooms, but not on details from conversations.
problem.pain_2_description: Via email you don't know what the client thinks. No insight into interest, no overview of visited properties.
problem.pain_3_description: Agent has no control over what goes to client. System sends everything automatically.

solution.title: The Tesoro Solution: Portal as Must-Have Tool
solution.description: We don't send automatic emails. Instead, your client gets a portal they can't do without during their house hunt.
solution.benefit_1_description: Not just Tesoro proposals - all properties the client visits go in their portal. If they stay with you, they have complete history.
solution.benefit_2_description: Client takes photos during viewing, adds private notes. Only for them, not shared with agent.
solution.benefit_3_description: Client rates each property 1-5 stars. Agent sees ratings (not notes/photos). After 20 viewings, client still knows exactly what they thought of each property.

client_perspective.title: Why Clients Can't Do Without the Portal
client_perspective.description: A client views an average of 20 properties per week. On Friday they don't remember what they saw on Monday or what they thought of it.
client_perspective.feature_1_description: All visited properties in one place. With photos, notes, ratings. Sort by 5-star properties.
client_perspective.feature_2_description: Upload photos and make notes directly while walking through the property. Never forget important details again.
client_perspective.feature_3_description: Which property had that nice garden? Which was too dark? Check your notes and photos. Re-evaluate.
client_perspective.quote: On Friday I don't remember what I viewed on Monday. Now I do - with complete photos, notes and my own ratings.

loyalty.title: Creates Loyalty
loyalty.description: This is why clients stay with you:
loyalty.reason_1_description: Client doesn't want to go to another agent because they'll lose their portal with complete viewing history.
loyalty.reason_2_description: All properties they view through you come in their portal. That strengthens the bond with your office.
loyalty.reason_3_description: The portal becomes their personal house-hunting tool with all their photos, notes and ratings.
loyalty.stat: 78% of clients stay with the same agent because of portal history

makelaar_benefits.title: Benefits for Agent
makelaar_benefits.benefit_1_description: No automatic emails. You choose what goes in propose lane. Client gets email 2x per day with link to portal.
makelaar_benefits.benefit_2_description: Agent sees the 5-star ratings client gives. Know exactly which properties client really finds interesting.
makelaar_benefits.benefit_3_description: Notes and photos remain private for client. This builds trust. You do see ratings.
makelaar_benefits.benefit_4_description: Portal with complete history creates loyalty. Client doesn't want to switch and lose their data.

workflow.title: How It Works
workflow.step_1_description: You move matches to propose lane. Only what you approve goes to client.
workflow.step_2_description: Clients with portal account receive email 2x per day with link to new proposals in portal.
workflow.step_3_description: Client views properties in portal. Marks interesting (viewing + 3 dates) or not interesting (with reason).
workflow.step_4_description: During viewing: client takes photos, writes notes, gives 5-star rating.
workflow.step_5_description: All visited properties stay in portal. With photos (private), notes (private), ratings (agent sees these).
workflow.step_6_description: Client can later compare all properties. Filter on 5-stars. Check Monday's notes. Perfect overview.

features_grid.title: Portal Features
features_grid.feature_1_description: Not just Tesoro proposals - all properties client visits through you.
features_grid.feature_2_description: Client uploads photos during viewing. Stay private, only visible to client.
features_grid.feature_3_description: Notes like 'garden too small' or 'perfect for home office'. Only for client.
features_grid.feature_4_description: Rate each property 1-5 stars. Agent sees ratings, client maintains overview.
features_grid.feature_5_description: All viewings saved. Also rejected properties with reason why.
features_grid.feature_6_description: Filter on 5-stars, search by location, view only interesting properties.
features_grid.feature_7_description: For interesting property: request viewing with 3 proposed dates.
features_grid.feature_8_description: Follow status: proposed ‚Üí viewed ‚Üí offer ‚Üí closed.

cta.title: Give Your Clients the Portal They Can't Do Without
cta.description: Create loyalty by helping your clients maintain overview during their house hunt.

email_integration.meta_description: Seamless integration with Gmail, Outlook and other email systems. All communication automatically stored in the customer file.

benefits.title: Never Search for Emails Again

benefits.benefit_2_description: Complete communication history per customer in one clear overview
benefits.benefit_3_description: Professional email templates for every stage of the sales process

workflow.title: How Email Integration Works
workflow.step_1_description: Connect your existing Gmail, Outlook or other email account with one click
workflow.step_2_description: Tesoro recognizes email addresses and links messages to the right customer
workflow.step_3_description: Emails are automatically organized per customer and property in your CRM
workflow.step_4_description: Use professional templates for follow-ups, offers and confirmations

cta.title: Work more efficiently
cta.description: See how email integration streamlines your communication

benefits.title: All Properties Under Control
benefits.benefit_1_description: All property information, photos and documents in one searchable system
benefits.benefit_2_description: Automatic categorization by type, location, price range and status
benefits.benefit_3_description: Instantly share property details with customers via portal or email

workflow.title: Property Management Made Easy
workflow.step_1_description: Add properties manually or import automatically from MLS systems
workflow.step_2_description: Add photos, descriptions, floor plans and all relevant details
workflow.step_3_description: Track status: available, under option, sold, with automatic updates
workflow.step_4_description: Automatically share with matching customers via the portal and email

cta.title: Organize your properties
cta.description: Discover how smart property management saves time and improves service

reporting_analytics.meta_description: Extensive reports and analytics about your performance, conversion rates, and revenue. Make data-driven decisions.

hero.title: Data-Driven Insights
hero.description: Extensive reports and analytics about your performance, conversion rates, and revenue. Real-time dashboards and automated reports give you insight into what works and what doesn't.

benefits.title: Make Smart Decisions
benefits.benefit_1_description: Live overview of your performance, leads, conversions and revenue
benefits.benefit_2_description: Weekly and monthly reports automatically in your inbox
benefits.benefit_3_description: AI predictions about market trends and opportunities

workflow.step_2_description: AI analyzes patterns and trends in your sales process

integration_section.title: {feature_name} integrates seamlessly
integration_section.description: {feature_name} works alongside the tools you already use to maximize your efficiency.

website_api.meta_title: Website API & Web Development Services | Tesoro CRM
website_api.meta_description: Tesoro builds blazingly fast, secure websites with Astro.Build and PayloadCMS on Cloudflare. Including Website API for third parties with properties integration, search filters, lead forms and more.

hero.title: Blazingly Fast Websites & Powerful API
hero.description: Tesoro's web department builds super fast and secure websites with Astro.Build and PayloadCMS, hosted on Cloudflare. Plus a complete Website API that third parties can integrate.

tech_stack.title: Modern Tech Stack for Maximum Performance
tech_stack.description: We use the latest technologies to build websites that load blazingly fast, are secure and scalable.
tech_stack.astro_description: The fastest web framework for content-driven websites. Generates pure HTML without unnecessary JavaScript. Perfect for SEO and Core Web Vitals.
tech_stack.payload_description: Modern headless CMS with type-safe API. Easy content management without technical knowledge. Full control over your data.
tech_stack.cloudflare_description: The safest and fastest hosting platform in the world. CDN, DDoS protection, SSL, all included. Your website is available worldwide within milliseconds.

flexibility.title: Flexibility Your Business Needs
flexibility.description: Whether you want a simple property listing website or a fully custom platform - our tech stack makes it possible.
flexibility.benefit_1_description: Every website is custom built for your specific needs. No templates, no limitations.
flexibility.benefit_2_description: Your properties from Tesoro CRM sync automatically to your website. Always up to date.
flexibility.benefit_3_description: From 10 to 10,000 properties - performance stays constant. Cloudflare scales automatically.
flexibility.benefit_4_description: Dutch, English, Spanish - as many languages as you want. Built-in i18n support.
flexibility.benefit_5_description: 60% of your visitors come via mobile. Our websites are optimized for every screen.
flexibility.benefit_6_description: Server-side rendering, structured data, Core Web Vitals - everything for top Google rankings.
flexibility.feature_1_description: Every website is custom built for your specific needs. No templates, no limitations.
flexibility.feature_2_description: Your properties from Tesoro CRM sync automatically to your website. Always up to date.
flexibility.feature_3_description: From 10 to 10,000 properties - performance stays constant. Cloudflare scales automatically.
flexibility.feature_4_description: Dutch, English, Spanish - as many languages as you want. Built-in i18n support.
flexibility.feature_5_description: 60% of your visitors come via mobile. Our websites are optimized for every screen.
flexibility.feature_6_description: Server-side rendering, structured data, Core Web Vitals - everything for top Google rankings.

website_api.title: Website API for Third Parties
website_api.description: Develop your own website or have an external developer build - our API gives full access to everything you need.
website_api.intro: The Website API is designed for developers who want to build custom websites that seamlessly integrate with Tesoro CRM. All properties, search filters, lead forms and more - everything via one API.
website_api.feature_1_description: Full access to your properties including photos, prices, specifications. Real-time sync with CRM.
website_api.feature_2_description: Pre-built search filters for type, location, price, rooms, surface area and more. Faceted search included.
website_api.feature_3_description: Ready-to-use lead capture forms that save directly in Tesoro CRM. With validation and spam protection.
website_api.feature_4_description: Automatic image optimization and resizing. Perfect for fast page loads and SEO.
website_api.feature_5_description: Choose your favorite API protocol. Full TypeScript support for type-safety.
website_api.feature_6_description: Real-time notifications for new properties, leads or status updates.

developer_friendly.title: Developer-Friendly
developer_friendly.description: Our API is built for developers by developers.
developer_friendly.feature_1_description: Complete API docs with code examples for all endpoints. Get started in minutes.
developer_friendly.feature_2_description: Ready-to-use SDKs for JavaScript, Python, PHP. TypeScript support included.
developer_friendly.feature_3_description: Test all API features in our sandbox environment before going live.
developer_friendly.feature_4_description: Fair usage limits: 50,000 requests/month included. Upgrade available.

website_api.features_description: All tools you need to build a custom website that seamlessly integrates with Tesoro CRM.

use_cases.description: From simple property websites to advanced mobile apps - our API gives you unlimited possibilities.
use_cases.title: What Can You Build?
use_cases.case_1_description: Build your own property listing website with advanced filters, map views and lead capture.
use_cases.case_2_description: Use the API to build native iOS/Android apps for your clients.
use_cases.case_3_description: Embed property listings on other websites with our iframe widgets.
use_cases.case_4_description: Create specific landing pages per neighborhood or property type with automatic property feeds.
use_cases.case_5_description: Build chatbots that automatically send properties based on client preferences.
use_cases.case_6_description: Pull property data to your own analytics tools for deep market analysis.

pricing_section.title: Website Services Pricing
pricing_section.description: Transparent pricing for website development and API access. Choose what fits your business.
pricing_section.enterprise_note: Need more? Contact us for enterprise pricing and custom solutions.
pricing_section.website_build_description: Custom website design and development with Astro.Build and PayloadCMS. Including CRM integration and SEO optimization.
pricing_section.website_build_includes: Includes: Custom design, Astro development, PayloadCMS setup, property sync, lead forms, Cloudflare hosting setup, 3 months support
pricing_section.api_access_description: Full API access included with every Tesoro CRM subscription. No extra costs.
pricing_section.api_access_includes: Includes: 50,000 requests/month, RESTful & GraphQL, Webhooks, SDKs, documentation, sandbox environment
pricing_section.api_upgrade_description: For websites with high traffic. Higher rate limits and priority support.
pricing_section.api_upgrade_includes: Includes: 500,000 requests/month, priority support, dedicated account manager, custom webhooks
pricing_section.enterprise_description: For large offices with specific requirements. Custom solutions and dedicated infrastructure.
pricing_section.enterprise_includes: Includes: Unlimited requests, dedicated servers, SLA guarantees, 24/7 support, custom features

security.title: Security First
security.description: We take security seriously. Cloudflare's enterprise-grade security protects your website against all threats.
security.feature_1_description: Automatic protection against DDoS attacks. Unlimited bandwidth.
security.feature_2_description: Free SSL certificates with auto-renewal. A+ SSL rating by default.
security.feature_3_description: Protection against SQL injection, XSS and other web attacks.
security.feature_4_description: Automatic protection against brute force attacks and API abuse.
security.feature_5_description: All data is stored in EU datacenters. Fully GDPR compliant.
security.feature_6_description: Monthly security scans and penetration testing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question_1: How long does it take to build a website?
faq.answer_1: Average 4-6 weeks from design to launch. Depending on complexity and number of custom features.
faq.answer_2: Yes! PayloadCMS has a super intuitive admin interface. You can edit texts, photos and properties yourself without technical knowledge.
faq.question_3: What if I already have a website?
faq.answer_3: No problem! We can integrate the API into your existing website or do a complete migration to Astro.
faq.question_4: Are there limits to the API?
faq.answer_4: Standard: 50,000 requests/month. More than enough for most websites. Upgrade possible to 500,000/month.
faq.question_5: How fast is the property sync?
faq.answer_5: Real-time! As soon as you add/modify a property in Tesoro CRM, it's live on your website within seconds via the API.
faq.answer_6: Cloudflare hosting is included with website development. No extra costs. Unlimited bandwidth.
faq.question_7: Do I need technical knowledge to use the API?
faq.answer_7: Basic programming knowledge is required. But with our extensive documentation, code examples and SDKs, even developers with limited API experience can get started quickly.
faq.question_8: Can I test the API before committing?
faq.answer_8: Yes! We provide a full sandbox environment where you can test all API features with dummy data before going live. No commitment required.

developer_friendly.title: Developer-Friendly API
developer_friendly.description: Built for developers, by developers. Everything you need to integrate Tesoro CRM with your custom website.
developer_friendly.feature_1_description: Complete API docs with code examples for all endpoints. Get started in minutes.
developer_friendly.feature_2_description: Ready-to-use SDKs for JavaScript, Python, PHP. TypeScript support included.
developer_friendly.feature_3_description: Test all API features in our sandbox environment before going live.
developer_friendly.feature_4_description: 50,000 requests/month included. Upgrade available for high-traffic sites.

cta.title: Ready for a Blazingly Fast Website?
cta.description: Contact us for a no-obligation conversation about your website plans.

fair_use_policy.meta_description: Transparent Fair Use Policy for Tesoro CRM. Understand our reasonable usage limits and how they ensure optimal performance for all customers.

hero.title: Fair Usage For Everyone
hero.description: Our Fair Use Policy ensures that all customers experience optimal performance. The limits are generous and designed for normal professional use. Read what this means for you.

intro.title: Why Fair Use?
intro.description: Tesoro CRM offers unlimited users, properties and deals. But some features have limits to prevent abuse and ensure optimal performance for all customers.
intro.benefit_1: No hidden costs or pay-per-use fees
intro.benefit_3: Fair, transparent limits for all features
intro.benefit_1_description: Limits ensure that all customers have fast and reliable service.
intro.benefit_2_description: You know exactly what the limits are and how much you use.
intro.benefit_3_description: With normal professional use you won't encounter these limits.

limits.title: Usage Limits per Feature
limits.description: Below you'll find the limits for each feature. With normal professional use you won't encounter these limits.
limits.ai_matching_description: Every time a property or buyer profile changes, a match is calculated. This happens automatically.
limits.storage_description: All files: property photos, documents, contracts, IDs, appraisal reports.
limits.email_description: All emails sent from Tesoro: proposals to clients, notifications, campaign emails.
limits.api_description: For integrations with external systems: MLS platforms, portals, other tools.
limits.users_description: The number of team members who can use Tesoro CRM in your office.
limits.users_typical: Standard subscription includes up to 10 users
limits.users_note: Need more than 10 users? Contact us
limits.portal_description: All your clients can use the portal. There are no limits on the number of client accounts.

examples.title: Normal vs. Excessive Usage
examples.description: Examples of normal professional usage compared to abuse of the system.
examples.normal_description: Using Tesoro CRM as intended for daily real estate business operations. This is what normal professional usage looks like:
examples.normal_2: Updating buyer profiles when preferences change
examples.normal_3: Sending proposals to clients 2x per day
examples.excessive_description: Using Tesoro CRM in ways that abuse the system or negatively impact other customers. These behaviors violate our Fair Use Policy:
examples.excessive_1: Automated scripts that trigger new matches every hour
examples.excessive_3: Using API for data mining or scraping
examples.excessive_4: Storing backups and personal files unrelated to CRM
examples.excessive_5: Creating multiple accounts to circumvent limits

monitoring.title: How We Monitor Usage
monitoring.description: We monitor usage to ensure fair use for all customers.
monitoring.transparency_description: You can always see your current usage in the Tesoro dashboard. No surprises.
monitoring.notifications_description: If you approach 80% of a limit, you'll receive a notification. So you can take action in time.
monitoring.grace_description: 7 days to resolve before restrictions apply
monitoring.grace_period_description: If you exceed a limit, you have 7 days to resolve it before restrictions apply.

overage.title: What Happens If I Exceed a Limit?
overage.description: We understand that occasionally you may exceed a limit. Here's what happens:
overage.step_1_description: You receive an email and notification in Tesoro when you exceed a limit.
overage.step_2_description: You have 7 days to reduce usage or upgrade to a higher plan.
overage.step_3_description: Our support team will contact you to discuss options and find a solution.
overage.step_4_description: Only if no solution is found after 7 days, the specific feature will be temporarily restricted until usage is reduced.
overage.no_surprise: No surprise charges - we always notify you first and work with you to find a solution

upgrade.title: Need More?
upgrade.description: If you consistently exceed limits, it may be time to upgrade to a custom plan.
upgrade.benefit_1: Custom limits tailored to your needs
upgrade.benefit_2: Add unlimited users to your office
upgrade.benefit_3: Priority support with dedicated account manager
upgrade.benefit_4: Flexible pricing based on actual usage
upgrade.benefit_1_description: Custom limits for AI matching, storage, email and API.
upgrade.benefit_2_description: Add more than 10 users to your office.
upgrade.benefit_3_description: Faster response times and dedicated account manager.
upgrade.benefit_4_description: Pay only for what you use with custom pricing based on your needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer_1: Limits ensure that all customers experience optimal performance. They prevent abuse and ensure server capacity is fairly distributed.
faq.question_2: How do I know how much I use?
faq.answer_2: You can always see your current usage in the Tesoro dashboard under Settings > Usage. You'll also receive notifications when you approach a limit.
faq.question_3: What happens if I accidentally exceed a limit?
faq.answer_3: No problem! You have a 7-day grace period to resolve it. Our support team will contact you to discuss options.
faq.question_4: Can I temporarily increase a limit?
faq.answer_4: Yes, contact our support team if you temporarily need more capacity (e.g., for a large campaign). We can often temporarily increase limits.
faq.question_5: Are limits per user or per office?
faq.answer_5: Most limits are per office, not per user. The entire office shares the limits (except for the number of users).
faq.question_6: What if I need more than 10 users?
faq.answer_6: Contact us for custom pricing. We offer flexible plans for offices with more than 10 users.

cta.title: Questions about Fair Use?
cta.description: Our support team is happy to help answer your questions.
